## TransactionOptions type


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export type TransactionOptions = {
    from: Address;
    to: Address;
    gas?: BigNumber.Value;
    gasPrice?: BigNumber.Value;
    value?: BigNumber.Value;
    data: string;
    nonce?: BigNumber.Value;
};
```
